CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...14. The active Pepsi-Cola Company booth is partially hidden by hundreds of thirsty visitors. Dave Watson, assisted by Mrs. Dolores Redwood and Mrs. Betty Fowler, were kept quite busy each evening throughout the show...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Crowd gathered in front of Pepsi-Cola booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pepsi-Cola Company.
